title: ZIG Wallet
successFeeTooltip: Pay the success fees of any Profit Sharing Service with ZIG and get a discount on the amount to pay.
tradingFeeTooltip: Zignaly will return the whole trading fees of your new trades in USDT to your account and will charge you the equivalent amount minus the discount in ZIG.
savingMoney: You are SAVING MONEY with ZIG!

export.title: Transaction History Report
export.description: We will process your request and send you an email in the following 10 minutes with the information to download your transactions history report.
export.success: Your request has been processed successfully. Please check your email for the download link.

deposit.title: Deposit Crypto
deposit.description: To deposit {{coin}} tokens, select the network and send to the address below.
deposit.no-network: Deposit is not available on this network

depositAddress.label: Deposit Address:
depositAddress.placeholder: Choose the currency and the network first.
depositAddress.warning: Only send {{network}} {{coin}} tokens to this address
